attributes.action: Allow the railway industry more freedom to manage itself and to remove controls excercised by DfT and the treasury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present train companies can only operate services with the approval of the DfT and can only operate equipment as approved by that Ministry e.g. they cannot buy in new stock to improve services.  There is no need for civil servants to be involved in the day to day operation of railways save, perhaps, for safety issues.
